title: Team LF Toplaner Perf Diamond
body:
Looking for a plat/Diamond toplaner for Tournaments please provide the following 


InGame Name:
Age:
Main champions:
Current soloq/flex ranks:
Timezone:


 Must have mic/discord (please dont add me befor posting)

replies.body:

Age: 22
Main champions: darius rene swain fiora riven
